Class SudokuBoardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SudokuBoardManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SudokuBoardManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements SudokuBoardManagerInterface
    Manages the data for a sudoku board game

    Adam Holt

        Displays the allowable values at the specified location
        Specified by:
        displayPossibleValues in interface SudokuBoardManagerInterface
        Parameters:
        r - Row location
        c - Column location
        Returns:
        Array containing valid values for the specified location
        Throws:
        InputOutOfRangeException - if the values for the row or column are invalid (> 9 or < 1)

        Linear search algorithm to locate a specific value in a passed array
        Parameters:
        v - Value to locate
        a - Array to search
        Returns:
        True if the value is found, False if it is not
